alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Northwest Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL HAWKINS AND NORTHWESTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Rogersville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Surgoinsville, Bulls Gap, Baileyton, St. Clair, Kepler, McCloud, Romeo, and Jearoldstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
